mapper.select: SELECT CS_KEYWORD_NO, CS_KEYWORD_VALUE FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE_KEYWORD WHERE CS_TYPE_NO = #{csTypeNo}
SELECT CS_DETAIL_TITLE, CS_DETAIL_CONTENT FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE_DETAIL WHERE CS_DETAIL_STATUS = 'Y' AND CS_KEYWORD_NO = #{csKeywordNo} ORDER BY CS_DETAIL_ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE_DETAIL WHERE CS_DETAIL_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT CS_DETAIL_NO, CS_DETAIL_TITLE, USER_ID, CS_DETAIL_ENROLL_DATE FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE_DETAIL CSD JOIN USER_INFO ON (CS_DETAIL_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE CSD.CS_DETAIL_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CS_DETAIL_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE_DETAIL CSD JOIN USER_INFO ON (CS_DETAIL_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE CSD.CS_DETAIL_STATUS = 'Y'
AND USER_ID
AND CS_DETAIL_TITLE
AND CS_DETAIL_CONTENT
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT CS_DETAIL_NO, CS_DETAIL_TITLE, USER_ID, CS_DETAIL_ENROLL_DATE FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE_DETAIL CSD JOIN USER_INFO ON (CS_DETAIL_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE CSD.CS_DETAIL_STATUS = 'Y'
AND USER_ID
AND CS_DETAIL_TITLE
AND CS_DETAIL_CONTENT
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY CS_DETAIL_NO DESC

SELECT CS_DETAIL_NO, CS_DETAIL_TITLE, USER_ID, CS_DETAIL_ENROLL_DATE, CS_DETAIL_CONTENT FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE_DETAIL CSD JOIN USER_INFO ON (CS_DETAIL_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE CSD.CS_DETAIL_STATUS = 'Y' AND CS_DETAIL_NO = #{boardNo}
